ovdesc.p: When the service EXTRACT.COMPARE.DATA is run , the data records are compared as per specified criteria and differences if any are written into this file .

desc.p: Contains the base value against which , the other value is to be compared . Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Contains the value which is to be compared , with the base value . Upto 35 characters are allowed.

The id is of the format MODULE.COMPARE.DETS*FILE.NAME*RECORD.ID(routines specified in COMPARE.ID.RTN of application COMPARE.FILE.DETAILS can return script id instead of record id alternatively). Upto 140 characters are allowed.
Contains the name of the field for which the comparison has been done. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Contains the id of the compare differences which caused the link file to be selected . Upto 35 characters are allowed.
